<!---Respect width/height when available by @cachafla in [#498](https://github.com/validmind/frontend/pull/498)--->
- **Respect width/height when available**. - Fixes an issue where some plots were being cut off due to having more height than available in the current viewport. This is fixed by respecting the plot's original defined height instead of setting a maximum pre-configured height on the frontend code

<!---Makes author's name contextual to currently logged user by @gtagle in [#492](https://github.com/validmind/frontend/pull/492)--->
- **Makes author's name contextual to currently logged user**. - Fixed an issue where activity logs were being shown out of context displaying the logged in user's name instead of referring to them by "You".
